transcript:
Hello.
Hello, please [inaudible] India Mart se baat kar rahi hu.
Han, boliye.
Main Ankita baat kar rahi hu India Mart team se, balance ko fund ke regarding connect kiya hai mam.
Thik hai aap ek kaam kijiye aap thoda baad mein phone kijiye.
30 minutes ke baad. Aaj aaj ghanta aaj ghanta baad mein phone kijiye.
8 ghante baad.
Han han 30 minutes ke baad phone kijiye. Okay, okay, okay, okay fine.
summary:
Concerns:

- Regarding balance to fund.



Resolution:

- None



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Customer requested a call back after 30 minutes.

None
